definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)

sentences.english: Cicadas chirp, spin it for a whole century.
sentences.chinese: 蟬鳴聲，推少了整整一個世紀。

sentences.english: The call of cicadas seems especially mournful after the autumn.
sentences.chinese: 入秋以後的蟬鳴顯得特別清切。

sentences.english: At summer night, the sound of cicadas is around him, a moth spinning ceaselessly. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的夜晚，周圍都是蟬鳴，一隻蛾子在不停地打轉。

sentences.english: No obvious directivity occurs in the songs of black cicada.
sentences.chinese: 黑蟬鳴聲的波形結構無明顯的方向性。

sentences.english: The song of the cicadas sounded, mixed with the songs of the distance cicadas.
sentences.chinese: 蟬鳴聲響起，漸漸與遠處的蟬聲連成一片。

sentences.english: Around the house are full of ancient big trees with birds and cicadas chirping.
sentences.chinese: 屋前房後到處是古木參天，蟬鳴鳥叫。

sentences.english: No summer hates the sound of cicadas.

definition: to talk in one's sleep/crazy talk
to emit a sound/(of birds, insects etc) to chirp, hoot etc/(of a siren, steam whistle etc) to sound
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
